mapper.select: SELECT datetime_kind AS "kind", m_date AS "m", s_date AS "sd", e_date AS "ed" FROM tb_member_config WHERE member_id = #{id}

SELECT t1.service_id AS "sId", t1.service_name AS "sNm", t2.member_id AS "mId" FROM tb_service_info t1 LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM tb_sel_shop_list WHERE member_id = #{id}) t2 ON t1.service_id = t2.service_id ORDER BY t1.service_name

SELECT t1.service_id AS "sId", t1.service_name AS "sNm", t1.col_path AS "path" FROM tb_service_info t1, (SELECT * FROM tb_sel_shop_list WHERE member_id = #{id}) t2 where t1.service_id = t2.service_id ORDER BY t1.service_name

SELECT t1.service_name AS "sNm", concat(t1.col_path,'/',t4.col_dd,t4.col_hh,'/',t3.category_id,'.',t4.col_dd,t4.col_hh,'.browser.jpg') AS "img", t4.col_dd AS "d", t4.col_hh AS "h" FROM tb_service_info t1, ( SELECT * FROM tb_sel_shop_list WHERE member_id = #{id}) t2, tb_category_info t3, tb_col_result t4, tb_err_file_info t5, ( SELECT * FROM tb_member_config WHERE member_id = #{id}) t6 WHERE t1.service_id = t2.service_id AND t1.service_id = t3.service_id AND t3.category_id = t4.category_id AND t4.category_id = t5.category_id AND t5.file_kind = '0' AND t5.file_st = '00' AND CASE WHEN t6.datetime_kind = 'D' THEN Date(t4.col_dd) BETWEEN Date(t6.s_date) AND Date(t6.e_date) WHEN t6.datetime_kind = 'M' THEN Date(t4.col_dd) BETWEEN Date(t6.m_date+'01') AND Date(t6.m_date+'01') END ORDER BY t1.service_name, t3.category_id

SELECT DISTINCT t4.col_dd AS "d" FROM tb_service_info t1, (SELECT * FROM tb_sel_shop_list WHERE member_id = #{id}) t2, tb_category_info t3, tb_col_result t4, tb_err_file_info t5, (SELECT * FROM tb_member_config WHERE member_id = #{id}) t6 WHERE t1.service_id = t2.service_id AND t1.service_id = t3.service_id AND t3.category_id = t4.category_id AND t4.category_id = t5.category_id AND t5.file_kind = '0' AND t5.file_st = '00' ORDER BY 1
